message: Let's start with a simple offer. I take $6000, you get $4000.  It's in your best interest to settle this quickly.
I think it's fairer to split the money more evenly.  I'm willing to take a little less now to avoid the inflation penalty in future rounds.
The value is decreasing with every round, Bob. I'll take a little less than my initial offer, but I won't accept anything less than $5500.
